member.name: T:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Input.TouchExtensions
member.summary: Static class containing a set of extension methods related to WPF Touch APIs and Surface SDK APIs.

member.name: M:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Input.TouchExtensions.TryEnableNativeTouch(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Enables and disables tablet gestures (flicks, hold gesture, etc.) on the .

member.name: T:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Properties.Resources.FailedToEnableNativeTouchOnWindow
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to enable Native Touch on Window..

member.name: T:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Controls.OptimizedSurfaceWindow
member.summary: A that enables Native Touch automatically if is set to true (default).

member.name: P:Touchtech.Surface.Presentation.Controls.OptimizedSurfaceWindow.IsOptimizationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether optimization is enabled on this through the use of the Native Touch features.
member.remarks: Native Touch will only be enabled if Surface Input is suppressed. Please make sure to suppress Surface Input through the use of or one of its helper methods in the same class.
